wordpressPost.title: Top 10 Actions Taken on the WeSpire Platform
wordpressPost.content:
The WeSpire platform encourages employees to take actions that have a positive impact on their personal lives, at work and in society. Here are the ten most completed actions that WeSpire users took in 2016.

Top 10 Most Completed Actions in 2016

  1. Give Kudos: recognize a colleague
  2. Commit a random act of kindness
  3. Turn off the faucet while brushing teeth
  4. Wash a load of laundry in cold water
  5. Try an eco-friendly wine
  6. Provide a homeless person with a hot meal
  7. Minimize food waste today
  8. Take 5 minutes to stretch
  9. Recycle an item at work today
  10. Take the stairs today

If you’re not sure about the impact these actions can have, take a look at the results our top six power users generated on their own. Learn more about the behavioral and game-mechanics of the WeSpire platform which spur users to take these positive actions!
